channel.title: Webclient help [Reward]
channel.description:
Hello guys need help! all I need help with is one little thing, I took a client and changed the links where the cache downloads from, I changed the link in cachedownloader.java and client.java and it compiles fine but then the client loads I get this.
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\LostLegacy\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cann ot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:64) at client.startUp(client.java:7812) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5281) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Webclient help [Reward]
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Yes I know, but does the link that you are using have direct downloading?

Read full topic

item.description:
@unleashed_pvp wrote:

Naah, All I did is change the cache links
